name: polyethylene terephthalate, granulate, amorphous, recycled to generic market for amorphous PET granulate | polyethylene terephthalate, granulate, amorphous | Cutoff, U

ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/16590/documentation

This is a renaming activity linking recycled polyethylene terephthalate (PET), amorphous, granulate to the generic market for amorphous PET granulate.;Transport distances for road and rail freight based product category SCTG code 242 in the US BTS Commodity Flow Survey from 2012, US Dep. Of Transportation, Bureau of Transportation Statistics. Air freight was omitted due to assumed low relevance for this product category.
